asadharana illimak thama wruththiya samithiwalin nokala bawath, watup wishamathawaya niwaradi kirimata adala thiranaya kriyathmaka wimata awashya bawath, ee sambandhayen sakachchawak awashya nam, ee sandaha wruththiya samithi sudanam bawa da ohu wadiduratath pawasiya.

aya ohuta athata atha denne athwasum galawa dayi danaganimata kramayak natha.
api ape me thiyena mulya arbudayen goda enna biliyana 6k one kiyanne dolar miliyana 6000k ona thanata yuropaye inna pohosathma rata wana jarmaniya apita denne dolar miliyana 20yi.
widuhale gaurawaya aaraksha karaganima sandaha mema aparadhaya kala guruwarunta erehiwa nithiya ka්riyathmaka wiya yuthu bawa yukthi garuka aadi sisunge, degurun ge mathayayi.

ithin ohoma inna athara ara walan katte thibuna asamanya hadaruwak ma dutuwa, ee gana aacharya edwad hokinsanta kiwwama eya ee walan katta aragena mawath landan wishwa widyalayata genihilla eeka paramanuka nyashtika anwikshayakin pariksha karala baluwa.
surawa, suduwa allasa, samaja dushana kriya, me hama deyakma ada apa samajaye wisheshayen lama parapura gilaganimin thibenawa.
nathnam indriya gochara nirikshana sadharanikaranayen hadaganna hithaluwalata.
oyage hadawathata mage aadare danenna oona nisa.
baluwa widiyo sentar eke yaluwa innawada kiyala.
api hamoma ee koment eka dakke naththan pawulath kadena sayis ekak wage anthimata adagena duwanawa.
idiriyedi pawathwimata niyamitha wibhaga sandaha wana praweshapathra nikuth karayi…
ee nisa me satahana rusiyawenma patan gamu.
eka athakata eeka sadharanayi...
ee wenuwen yamak karana eka umbae wadak.
maranin pasu ena nisa pamanak meya nithya aathmayaka ranganayak kara nogatha yuthuya.
sajja, oba ha ekangayi wan hannan pesant...me ganayo palanayata angili gahana eka nawaththana kala mokawath karanna ba.
ape minissu dennek athadanguwata gaththa.
niwasa asala pihiti thawath niwasa wetha gos owunage sisitiwi kamara paddhathi pilibandawada soyabalannata polisiya unandu wuna.

ada tharagaya jaya ganna kandayamata labana irida pawathwena awasan maha tharagayata sudusukam labime awasthawa himi wanawa.

puwath sewa puduma wela inna.

mage hadawatha kampanayata pathkaramin, me lipiya liyamin sitina me mohothe (2013/08/04 dina 1326 paya) rathupaswala siddhiyen thuwala labu thawath siwil pudgalayaku jathika rohaledi miyagiya bawa widyuth madhya osse niwedanaya keruna.
niwtan kiwwe ara wasthu deka ekineka wetha adenne ee ee wasthuwen anith wasthuwa matha aakarshana balayak kriyathmaka wena nisayi kiyala.
koti sanwidhanaye parajaya yanu demala jathiwadaye thiranathmaka parajayaki.
naththal siya hewath santa klos jiwath wanneda me uththara dhrawayeya.
palamu ha pradhanama hethuwa wanne wruththiya samithi yanu samajika wagakimak sahitha prajathanthrawadi sanwidhana nowimaya.
mage wate inna aya math ekka tharaha nisa mata boruwata ledak thiyanawa kiyala pissan kotuwata genath damma.
eya kumana hethuwak wuwath, anda asala bima wathirimata ho anda langata noyanna.

"oya dannawada,mama oyata aadaraya kale ayi kiyala?"mama hithanne naha oya ekata hethuwa dannawa kiyala..oyata thibune harima lassana namak,mama aasa karana namak,kawadawath kochchara ahuwath mata epa nowena namak.."kasun" raththaran....mage jiwitheta nam oyata raththaran kese wethath thambaa kallaka disnayak genna bari una kiwwoth hari.mage jiwitheta oya aalokayak wenna oya kasun wenna epayi...oyage aththa nama wath danan hitiye naha kiyala kiyanne harima aasawen,godak loku boruwak..awurudu dekak thisse.namata aadaraya karapu nisa oyata lan wunu mata anthimata mata mage namath amathaka una ee siduwimen,adatath ka gana wath wishwasa nokaranna hithagena inna mata kawuru hari kollek hamba una gaman eeka amathaka wenawa.eka mage loku durwala kamak.hada ganna bari waradi sidda wenna puluwan thanak..eeth harima sathutin kiyanna puluwan ekama deyak thiyenawa,eeka thamayi mage jiwithe wunu hodama waradima oya,oya nisa mata mage hagim pennanna puluwan una..ada mama adanawa godak hodata,hama thissema hina wenawa,wedanawa nathi karaganna.eth hitha yatin thani wela widina duka oya dannawanam...

pilithura – methana ganudenu wela thiyenne dolar walin.dolar walin siduwena siyaluma ganudenu amarikawe adhikshanaya yatatheyi siduwanne.me hinda apata hakiyawak thiyenawa amarikawe sahaya athiwa me mudal ganudenuwa siduwela thiyenne kohomada kiyala hoyaganna.namuth meka kal gathawena wadak.mokada lokaye dolar ganudenu siduwenne hithagannawath bari ganan walin.amarikawa apata danumdila thibena me sambandhayen wimarshana siduwana bawa.idiriyata wadi wisthara heliwewi.
